name: Pivotris
description:
Tetris with a catch... you can't move your pieces! Just rotate them around a pivot (which you must move onto the piece itself :D).

Click onto the game if it doesn't respond to your commands. Beware: Chrome can be very slow to load the game.

Controls: arrow keys to move the pivot, A and D to rotate. SPACE to move down one line.

Made for #gmtkjam 2018 in less than three hours (plus almost an hour of bugfixing), but not submitted in time! :( We were all very busy, but we tried anyway...

UPDATE: We were lucky enough to be brought back into the accepted games! Play the prototype, try the concept and give us some feedback if you want :D

By Carmelo, Matteo and Salvo
